job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Levy Professionals is currently looking for DevOps Engineers with strong experience in Azure Cloud and Generative AI for one of the largest financial institutions in the Netherlands. You will be joining the bank to spearhead internal initiatives on Generative Artificial Intelligence and develop new innovative solutions. As part of the data and analytics domain you will collaborate with various data-centered teams and consultants on a daily basis in a large international and dynamic environment., As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for creating and maintained automated, scalable, and secure environments for deploying AI models and integrating them into Azure cloud solutions. Looking to future proof your CV and experience? This is THE opportunity for you.

   Your key responsibilities will include:

   -Automating deployment by building CI/CD pipelines,

   -Setting up the necessary cloud infrastructure by using Bicep (similar to terraform) to support AI workloads and that networking are configured optimally,

   -Using Azure AI services to not only develop new models and solutions but also to support code automation and script generation, predictive maintenance, incident analysis, anomaly detection, and more.
job_details.full_text:
DevOps Engineer

Levy Professionals is currently looking for DevOps Engineers with strong experience in Azure Cloud and Generative AI for one of the largest financial institutions in the Netherlands. You will be joining the bank to spearhead internal initiatives on Generative Artificial Intelligence and develop new innovative solutions. As part of the data and analytics domain you will collaborate with various data-centered teams and consultants on a daily basis in a large international and dynamic environment., As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for creating and maintained automated, scalable, and secure environments for deploying AI models and integrating them into Azure cloud solutions. Looking to future proof your CV and experience? This is THE opportunity for you.

   Your key responsibilities will include:

   -Automating deployment by building CI/CD pipelines,

   -Setting up the necessary cloud infrastructure by using Bicep (similar to terraform) to support AI workloads and that networking are configured optimally,

   -Using Azure AI services to not only develop new models and solutions but also to support code automation and script generation, predictive maintenance, incident analysis, anomaly detection, and more.

profile_classification.rationale: The role emphasizes building and maintaining automated, scalable, and secure environments for deploying AI models, with a strong focus on MLOps and cloud infrastructure. While Generative AI is mentioned, the core responsibilities lean towards productionizing models and supporting various AI workloads, aligning more closely with an ML Engineer's focus on MLOps and model deployment.

phrases: Automating deployment by building CI/CD pipelines
Setting up the necessary cloud infrastructure
maintain automated, scalable, and secure environments for deploying AI models
integrating them into Azure cloud solutions
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to building and managing the infrastructure and pipelines for deploying and maintaining AI models in production, which is the core of MLOps.

phrases: support code automation and script generation
predictive maintenance
incident analysis
anomaly detection
develop new models and solutions
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the application and development of models for various AI tasks, including predictive modeling and generative tasks like script generation.

phrases: support AI workloads
job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly detailed, supporting AI workloads often implies underlying data engineering tasks for model training and deployment.

phrases: integrating them into Azure cloud solutions
support code automation and script generation
job_tasks.justification: The integration of AI models into cloud solutions and the support for code automation suggest software development aspects, particularly in building around AI capabilities.

phrases: collaborate with various data-centered teams and consultants
soft_skills.justification: Explicit mention of collaboration with different teams.

phrases: Looking to future proof your CV and experience? This is THE opportunity for you.
soft_skills.justification: Implies a dynamic environment where continuous learning and adaptation are valued.

phrases: develop new innovative solutions
support code automation and script generation
predictive maintenance
incident analysis
anomaly detection
soft_skills.justification: The responsibilities listed involve solving complex problems using AI and automation.

phrases: spearhead internal initiatives on Generative Artificial Intelligence
develop new innovative solutions
soft_skills.justification: The role involves taking initiative and driving innovation in Generative AI.
